title: An Act relative to transparency and accountability in procurement

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Worrell of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3442) of Christopher J. Worrell that the Supplier Diversity Office annually collect and report certain procurement activity related to certified business enterprises and non-certified businesses by businesses, nonprofit corporations, and state authorities.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/15/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
